LayoutNode.Content: I purchased these pillow covers in February and anxiously await in spring to put them on my sofa. I put them on the pillows thesecond week of April, and it is now the end of June and they look horrible. I've never washed them, I let it roll them only. They are sofaded that I can't have guests over until I change them again. If you have a party or a one time event that you want to spruce up yourliving room for, or a guest bedroom that will not actually be frequently used, these might work for that. Read more
LayoutNode.SRC:
I purchased these pillow covers in February and anxiously await in spring to put them on my sofa. I put them on the pillows the second week of April, and it is now the end of June and they look horrible. I've never washed them, I let it roll them only. They are so faded that I can't have guests over until I change them again. If you have a party or a one time event that you want to spruce up your living room for, or a guest bedroom that will not actually be frequently used, these might work for that.
Read more

LayoutNode.Content: Durable fabric and decorative. Easy to unzip for cleaning and re-stuffing with an insert. To be a little cheaper, I used old clothing thatmy boys grew out of to stuff the pillow. Great solution and really adds to my porch furniture. I am currently using this outdoor, but itwould look great indoor as well. Read more
